com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz

Class SearchScreenActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.GeneralMenuActivity
      • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.SearchMenuActivity
        • com.skilltradiez.skilltraderz.SearchScreenActivity

  • public class SearchScreenActivity
extends SearchMenuActivity
    We want an android framework that will support the ability for the user to interact with our application in a very logical and easy way. So we're going to create an activity that is associated with just the activities with the user. This activity is going to be associated purely with the entire search activity process that the user will need to interact with through our application.

      • refineSearch

        protected void refineSearch()
        Provides a refined search with no parameters given and thus no string.

      • refineSearch

        public void refineSearch(java.lang.String query)
        Provides a refined search to the user, passed in the user's search query as a parameter. Doesn't return anything in particular, however just updates the User Interface to display the changes.
        Parameters:
        query - String input.
